verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:19
verses.text: Cursed shalt thou be when thou comest in, and cursed shalt thou be when thou goest out.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:20
verses.text: The Lord shall send upon thee cursing, vexation, and rebuke, in all that thou settest thine hand unto for to do, until thou be destroyed, and until thou perish quickly; because of the wickedness of thy doings, whereby thou hast forsaken me.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:21
verses.text: The Lord shall make the pestilence cleave unto thee, until he have consumed thee from off the land, whither thou goest to possess it.
